description.value:
Folgrit is the wife of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.Torag], and thus has a prominent role in the dwarven pantheon, having mothered several demigod children. She is patient with her husband and tries to stop him worrying too much, but also makes sure he is aware of the burden of responsibility he bears. Folgrit is the goddess of wives, mothers, and children, and tangentially the goddess of widows and orphans.

Title The Watchful Mother

Areas of Concern Children, hearths, mothers

Edicts Maintain the sanctity of a home, remain patient with others, take in those without families

Anathema Abandon your family, fail to defend your neighbors

Religious Symbol rune-carved hearth

Sacred Animal young animals

Sacred Colors gray, orange
